tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CloudComputingOptimization (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query_name VARCHAR(255),
    query_complexity VARCHAR(50),
    workload_distribution VARCHAR(50),
    optimization_strategy VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE cloud_workloads (id INT PRIMARY KEY, workload_name VARCHAR(255), workload_description TEXT, workload_type VARCHAR(50))

CREATE TABLE compute_instances (instance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, instance_type VARCHAR(50), cpu_count INT, memory_gb FLOAT, storage_gb INT, status VARCHAR(20))

CREATE TABLE workload_distribution (id INT PRIMARY KEY, workload_id INT, instance_id INT, start_time TIMESTAMP, end_time TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE virtual_machines (
    vm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_id INT NOT NULL,
    vm_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    cpu_cores INT NOT NULL,
    memory_gb INT NOT NULL
);
